title: Use of federal examinations
context: ยง412:2-201 Use of federal examinations. The commissioner may accept, adopt, or use in lieu of an examination prescribed by section 412:2-200 all or any part of the results of an examination conducted by a federal regulatory agency of a Hawaii financial institution for the same period or subject matter that would be covered by an examination required or permitted under this article. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
